name: Potion Panic (Trevor H.)
description:
Welcome to Potion Panic! How many potions can you make and serve?

Join together colors and help out various villagers and their curious ailments. 

(Controller enabled but the menu requires mouse)

How to play:

  • See what a villager needs.
  • Pick up a beaker from the Beaker Box.
  • Fill it at the Sink.
  • Use the Left and Right Color Stations to combine colors in order to make the desired potion.
    • (Open the help book if you don't know which one to make)
  • Put a Cork on it from the Cork Box.
  • Deliver it to the villager.
  • Repeat!

NOTE: Each color station can only give the potion ONE color. Such that if you want to make purple, you need RED from one color station and BLUE from the other. 

Controls:

  • A / D - Move left / right
  • Space - Interact
  • P - Pause / UnPause
